Uses of Package
state_machine

  • Packages that use state_machine 
    Package Description
    gui
    This package contains GUI related classes
    state_machine
    This package contains state machine interfaces and required classes for game execution
    video_poker
    This package implements the main Video Poker classes and Methods.
  • Classes in state_machine used by gui 
    Class and Description
    Tag
    Tags used in communications between commands executed by the state machine and the respective I/O handlers
  • Classes in state_machine used by state_machine 
    Class and Description
    Action
    Defines possible actions that trigger state transitions
    ActionMultiplicity
    Defines action parameter multiplicity
    State
    State class for defining available states of program execution
    State.StateName
    State Name enum
    StateMachineIO
    Interface for a State Machine I/O Handler.

    Tags used in communications between commands executed by the state machine and the respective I/O handlers
